summary: Jarle Klepp gets a message that forces his mind back to something he'd rather forgotten - his childhood with his father in Stavanger. When "Orheim" was his surname.
cast: Vebjørn Enger|Kristoffer Joner|Cecilie A. Mosli|Glenn André Viste Bøe|Eili Harboe|Rolf Kristian Larsen|Vera Rudi|Renate Hansen Reinsveen|Henrik Mestad|Tone Beate Mostraum|Gretelill Tangen|Andreas Cappelen|Pål Kvammen|Nina Ellen Ødegård|Reno Muren|Malvin Kvam|Berk Akay|Marianne Holter|Stine Mari Fyrileiv|Oliver Hohlbrugger|Kasper Skovli Botnen|Ruth Osmundsen|Helgar Nygaard|Arthur Berning|Lisa Loven Kongsli|Oleander Tengesdal|Bjørn Iversen|Renate Reinsve|Stine Tveito|Thomas Bechmann|Frank Dåbu|Nils Ingebretsen|Thea Green Lundberg
title: Kompani Orheim
